GV03sb_07_u:535: varṣenna kṛṣṭāya kṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca ninayati tasmātkṛṣṭāya cākṛṣṭāya ca varṣati 7.2.4.[6]

GV03sb_07_u:567: vai diśaḥ sarvābhya evāsminnetaddigbhyo 'nnaṃ dadhātyanuṣṭubbhirvapati vāgvā

GV03sb_07_u:596: prāṇāṃstadbhiṣajyati sa yatkṛṣṭa eva vapennākṛṣṭe prāṇāneva

GV03sb_07_u:598: bhiṣajyenna prāṇānkṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca vapati prāṇāṃśca tadātmānaṃ ca bhiṣajyati 7.2.4.[24]
GV03sb_07_u:606: purā jāyante vasantā prāvṛṣi śaradi manai nubabhrūṇāmahamiti somo vai babhruḥ

GV03sb_07_u:629: acita āhavanīyo 'tha rājānaṃ krīṇātyayaṃ vai loko

GV03sb_07_u:631: lokāvantareṇa dadhāti tasmādeṣa imau lokāvantareṇa pavate 7.3.1.[2]
GV03sb_07_u:633: acita āhavanīye 'tha rājānaṃ krīṇātyātmā vā agniḥ prāṇaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:634: soma ātmaṃstatprāṇam madhyato dadhāti tasmādayamātmanprāṇo madhyataḥ 7.3.1.[3]
GV03sb_07_u:636: acita āhavanīye 'tha rājānaṃ krīṇātyātmā vā agnī rasaḥ

GV03sb_07_u:646: ātmā vā agnī raso 'dhvara ātmānaṃ tadrasenānuṣajati
GV03sb_07_u:648: taddhaike / ubhayatraiva palāśaśākhayā vyudūhantyubhayatra vai cinotīti na tathā
GV03sb_07_u:649: kuryādavasyati vāva gārhapatyenordhva evāhavanīyena rohati tasmāttathā na kuryāt 7.3.1.[8]
GV03sb_07_u:651: nāhavanīye 'yaṃ vai loko gārhapatyaḥ paśava ūṣā
GV03sb_07_u:655: dyaurāhavanīyo divi tadapo dadhātyubhayatra sikatā nivapati reto vai sikatā
GV03sb_07_u:656: ubhayatra vai vikriyate tasmādretaso 'dhi vikriyātā iti 7.3.1.[10]
GV03sb_07_u:659: nāno vā etadyaddaivaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ ca drāghīyasā mantreṇāhavanīye nivapati
GV03sb_07_u:660: hrasīyasā gārhapatye drāghīyo hi devāyuṣaṃ hrasīyo manuṣyāyuṣaṃ sa pūrvāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:661: pariśridbhyo gārhapatye sikatā nivapati reto vai sikatā asmādretaso 'dīmā vikriyāntā
GV03sb_07_u:663: tadāhuḥ / yadyoniḥ pariśrito retaḥ sikatā atha pūrvāḥ pariśridbhyo gārhapatye sikatā
GV03sb_07_u:666: bhavatyathāhavanīye pariśrito 'bhimantrayate tasyokto bandhuratha sikatā nivapati

GV03sb_07_u:677: āptā vā asya tā diśo yā eṣu lokeṣvatha yā imāṃlokānpareṇa

GV03sb_07_u:687: āpto vā asya sa raso ya eṣu lokeṣvatha ya imāṃlokānparāṅraso
GV03sb_07_u:690: āpto vā asya sa raso yo 'syāmatha ya imām parāṅraso
GV03sb_07_u:693: vajro vai sphyo vīryaṃ vai vajro vittiriyaṃ vīryeṇa vai vittiṃ vindate 7.3.1.[20]
GV03sb_07_u:695: mā mā hiṃsījjanitā yaḥ pṛthivyā iti prajāpatirvai pṛthivyai janitā
GV03sb_07_u:696: mā mā hiṃsītprajāpatirityetadyo vā divaṃ satyadharmā vyānaḍiti yo vā divaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:697: satyadharmāsṛjatetyetadyaścāpaścandrāḥ prathamo jajāneti manuṣyā vā āpaścandrā
GV03sb_07_u:698: yo manuṣyānprathamo 'sṛjatetyetatkasmai devāya haviṣā vidhemeti prajāpatirvai
GV03sb_07_u:699: kastasmai haviṣā vidhemetyetattāmāhṛtyāntareṇa pariśrita ātmannupadadhāti sa yaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:703: abhyāvartasva pṛthivi yajñena payasā saheti yathaiva yajustathā
GV03sb_07_u:704: bandhurvapāṃ te agniriṣito arohaditi yadvai kiṃ cāsyāṃ sāsyai vapā tāmagniriṣita
GV03sb_07_u:705: upādīpto rohati tāmāhṛtyāntareṇa pakṣasaṃdhimātmannupadadhāti sa yo dakṣiṇāyāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:708: agne yatte śukraṃ yaccandraṃ yatpūtaṃ yacca yajñiyamitīyaṃ vā
GV03sb_07_u:709: agnirasyai tadāha taddevebhyo bharāmasīti tadasmai daivāya karmaṇe harāma
GV03sb_07_u:710: ityetattāmāhṛtyāntareṇa pucasaṃdhimātmannupadadhāti sa yaḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi raso
GV03sb_07_u:715: yonimiti satyaṃ vā ṛtaṃ satyasya yonimityetanmahiṣasya dhārāmityagnirvai mahiṣaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:716: sa hīdaṃ jāto mahāntsarvamaiṣṇādā mā goṣu viśatvā tanūṣvityātmā vai tanūrā mā
GV03sb_07_u:717: goṣu cātmani ca viśatvityetajjahāmi sedimanirāmamīvāmiti sikatāḥ pradhvaṃsayati
GV03sb_07_u:718: tadyaiva sediryānirā yāmīvā tāmetasyāṃ diśi dadhāti tasmādetasyāṃ diśi prajā
GV03sb_07_u:719: aśanāyukāstāmāhṛtyāntareṇa pakṣasaṃdhimātmannupadadhāti sa ya udīcyāṃ diśi raso
GV03sb_07_u:722: tāḥ sakvata upadadhāti sarvatastaddiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvato diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:723: sarvataḥ samīcīḥ sarvatastatsamīcīrdiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samīcyo diśastā
GV03sb_07_u:724: nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hi
GV03sb_07_u:725: diśastiṣṭhannupadadhāti tiṣṭhantīva hi diśo 'tho tiṣṭhanvai vīryavattaraḥ 7.3.1.[25]
GV03sb_07_u:729: tadāhuḥ / kathamasyaitāḥ pakvāḥ śṛtā upahitā bhavantīti raso vā etāḥ svayaṃśṛta u vai

GV03sb_07_u:738: yonirvā uttaravediryonau tadretaḥ siñcati yadvai yonau retaḥ

GV03sb_07_u:749: bhānunetyanūnavarcā uddīpyase bhānunetyetatputro mātarā vicarannupāvasīti putro
GV03sb_07_u:750: hyeṣa mātarā vicarannupāvati pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe itīme vai dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī te
GV03sb_07_u:754: dhītibhirhita iti dīpyasva dhītibhirhita ityetattve iṣaḥ saṃdadhurbhūrivarvasa iti tve
GV03sb_07_u:755: iṣaḥ saṃdadhurbahuvarpasa ityetaccitrotayo vāmajātā iti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ 7.3.1.[32]
GV03sb_07_u:759: dadhadamartyetatsadarśatasya vapuśo virājasīti darśatasya hyeṣa vapuṣo virājati
GV03sb_07_u:760: pṛṇakṣi sānasiṃ kratumiti pṛṇakṣi sanātanaṃ kratumityetat 7.3.1.[33]
GV03sb_07_u:763: pracetasamityetatkṣayantaṃ rādhaso maha iti kṣayantaṃ rādhasi mahatītyetadrātiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:764: vāmasya subhagām mahīmiṣamiti rātiṃ vāmasya subhagām
GV03sb_07_u:765: mahatīmiṣamityetaddadhāsi sānasiṃ rayimiti dadhāsi sanātanaṃ rayimityetat 7.3.1.[34]
GV03sb_07_u:768: viśvadarśato hyeṣo 'gniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janā iti yajño vai sumnaṃ yajñāya vā
GV03sb_07_u:769: etam puro dadhate śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā daivyam mānuṣā
GV03sb_07_u:770: yugetyāśṛṇvantaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā devam manuṣyā havāmaha ityetat 7.3.1.[35]
GV03sb_07_u:773: 'gnimevāsminnetadvaiśvānaraṃ reto bhūtaṃ śiñcati ṣaḍṛcena ṣaḍṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:775: tadāhuḥ / yadretaḥ sikatā ucyante kimāsāṃ reto rūpamiti śuklā iti brūyācuklaṃ hi reto
GV03sb_07_u:777: tadāhuḥ / yadārdraṃ retaḥ śuṣkāḥ sikatā nivapati kathamasyaitā ārdrā retorūpam
GV03sb_07_u:778: bhavantīti raso vai candāṃsyārdra u vai rasastadyadenāścandobhirnivapatyevamu
GV03sb_07_u:780: tadāhuḥ / kathamasyaitā ahorātrābhyāmupahitā bhavantīti dve vā ahorātre śuklaṃ ca
GV03sb_07_u:781: kṛṣṇaṃ ca dva sikate śuklā ca kṛṣṇā caivamu hāsyaitā ahorātrābhyāmupahitā
GV03sb_07_u:783: tadāhuḥ / kathamasyaitā ahorātraiḥ sampannā anyūnā anatiriktā upahitā
GV03sb_07_u:784: bhavantītyanantāni vā ahorātrāṇyanantāḥ sikatā evamu hāsyaitā ahorātraiḥ sampannā
GV03sb_07_u:785: anyūnā anatiriktā upahitā bhavantyatha kasmātsamudriyaṃ canda ityananto vai
GV03sb_07_u:787: tadāhuḥ / kathamasyaitāḥ pṛthaṅnānā yajurbhirupahitā bhavantīti mano vai
GV03sb_07_u:788: yajustadidam mano yajuḥ sarvāḥ sikatā anuvibhavatyevamu hāsyaitāḥ pṛthaṅnānā
GV03sb_07_u:790: tadāhuḥ / kathamasyaitāḥ sarvaiścandobhirupahitā bhavantīti yadevainā etena
GV03sb_07_u:791: ṣaḍṛcena nivapati yāvanti hi saptānāṃ candasāmakṣarāṇi tāvantyetasya
GV03sb_07_u:795: prajāpatistaddhaitadbrahmaṇa utsanne yatsikatā atha yadanutsannamidaṃ tadyo
GV03sb_07_u:797: tadasminnetatpratidadhāti tā asaṃkhyātā aparimitā nivapati ko hi tadveda
GV03sb_07_u:798: yāvattadbrahmaṇa utsannaṃ sa ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya
GV03sb_07_u:800: tadāhuḥ / kaitāsāmasaṃkhyātānāṃ saṃkhyeti dve iti brūyāddve hi sikate śuklā ca kṛṣṇā
GV03sb_07_u:801: cātho sapta viṃśatiśatānīti brūyādetāvanti hi saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇyatho dve
GV03sb_07_u:802: dvāpañcāśe śate ityetāvanti hyetasya ṣaḍṛcasyākṣarāṇyatho pañcaviṃśatiriti
GV03sb_07_u:806: yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā upadhīyante na pakṣapuceṣu na sādayati nedretaḥ prajātiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:810: tasmādyonau retaḥ siktamāpyāyate saumībhyām prāṇo vai somaḥ prāṇaṃ tadretasi
GV03sb_07_u:811: dadhāti tasmādretaḥ siktam prāṇamabhisambhavati pūyeddha yadṛte
GV03sb_07_u:812: prāṇātsambhavedeṣo haivātra sūdadohāḥ prāṇo vai somaḥ sūdadohāḥ 7.3.1.[46]
GV03sb_07_u:814: viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyamiti reto vai vṛṣṇyamāpyāyasva sametu te
GV03sb_07_u:815: sarvataḥ soma reta ityetadbhavā vājasya saṃgatha ityanne vai vājo bhavānnasya
GV03sb_07_u:816: saṃgatha ityetatsaṃ te payāṃsi samu yanti vājā iti raso vai payo 'nne vājāḥ saṃ te rasāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:817: samu yantvannānītyetatsaṃ vṛṣṇyabhimātiṣāha iti saṃ retāṃsi pāpmasaha
GV03sb_07_u:818: ityetadāpyāyamāno amṛtāya someti prajātyāṃ tadamṛtaṃ dadhāti tasmātprajātiramṛtā
GV03sb_07_u:819: divi śravāṃsyuttamāni dhiṣveti candramā vā asya divi śrava uttamaṃ sa
GV03sb_07_u:820: hyenamamuṣmiṃloke śrāvayati dvābhyāmāpyāyayati gāyatryā ca triṣṭubhā ca
GV03sb_07_u:824: dvābhyāmāpyāyayati taddvādaśa dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_07_u:828: pravargyopasadbhyām pracarati pravargyopasadbhyām pracaryāthaitāṃ carmaṇi citiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:829: samavaśamayanti tadyaccarmaṇi carma vai rūpaṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyai lomato loma vai
GV03sb_07_u:830: rūpaṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyai rohite rohite ha sarvāṇi rūpāṇi sarveṣāṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyā
GV03sb_07_u:835: karotyājyena taddhi śuddham medhyamatho anabhyārohāya na hi kiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:836: canānyaddhavirājyena prokṣanti tūṣṇīmaniruktaṃ vai tadyattūṣṇīṃ sarvaṃ vā
GV03sb_07_u:837: aniruktaṃ sarveṇaivaitacuddham medhyaṃ karotyatho anabhyārohāya na hi kiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:841: yadabhighāritaṃ tajjuṣṭaṃ tanmedhyamājyenājyena hi havirabhighārayanti tūṣṇīṃ
GV03sb_07_u:842: tūṣṇīṃ hi havirabhighārayanti darbhaiste hi śuddhā medhyā agrairagraṃ hi devānām 7.3.2.[4]
GV03sb_07_u:843: tadāhuḥ / yatprathamāmeva citim prokṣati kathamasyaiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ prokṣito
GV03sb_07_u:844: bhavati kathaṃ carmaṇi praṇītaḥ kathamaśvapraṇīta iti yadevātra sarvāsāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:845: citīnāmiṣṭakāḥ prokṣatyevamu hāsyaiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ prokṣito bhavatyevaṃ carmaṇi
GV03sb_07_u:849: yajñaṃ taṃsyamānānrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā ajighāṃsanna yakṣyadhve na yajñaṃ taṃsyadhva
GV03sb_07_u:850: iti tebhya etānagnīnetā iṣṭakā vajrānkṣurapavīnkṛtvā prāharaṃstairenānastṛṇvata
GV03sb_07_u:853: yaddevā akurvannidaṃ nu tāni rakṣāṃsi devairevopahatāni
GV03sb_07_u:854: yattvetatkaroti yaddevā akurvaṃstatkaravāṇītyatho yadeva rakṣo yaḥ pāpmā tebhya
GV03sb_07_u:861: purīṣyāso agnayaḥ prāvaṇabhiḥ sajoṣasa iti prāyaṇarūpaṃ na
GV03sb_07_u:862: tathā kuryādāgneyīreva gāyatrīḥ kāmavatīranubrūyādā te vatso mano yamattubhyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:867: tisrasrivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati tāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:868: sapta sampadyante saha triranūktābhyāṃ saptacitiko 'gniḥ sapta 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:869: saṃvatsaro 'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvattadbhavatyupāṃśvanvāha reto vā atra
GV03sb_07_u:870: yajña upāṃśu vai retaḥ sicyate paścādanubruvannanveti candobhirevaitadyajñam
GV03sb_07_u:873: etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na iha rakṣāṃsi
GV03sb_07_u:874: nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etaṃ vajramapaśyannamumevādityamasau vā āditya eṣo
GV03sb_07_u:875: 'śvasta etena vajreṇa purastādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭre svasti
GV03sb_07_u:876: samāśnuvata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena vajreṇa purastādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:877: apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭre svasti samaśnuta āgaghantyagniṃ dakṣiṇataḥ pucasya
GV03sb_07_u:880: antareṇa pariśritaḥ prāñcaṃ nayanti tatprācyai diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:881: pāpmānamapahanti taṃ dakṣiṇā taddakṣiṇāyai diśaḥ pāpmānamapahanti tam
GV03sb_07_u:882: pratyañcaṃ tatpratīcyai diśaḥ pāpmānamapahanti tamudañcaṃ tadudīcyai diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:886: etāṃ citimavaghrāpayatyasau vā āditya eṣo 'śva imā u
GV03sb_07_u:887: sarvāḥ prajā yā imā iṣṭakāstadyadavaghrādayatyasāveva tadāditya imāḥ prajā
GV03sb_07_u:888: abhijighrati tasmādu haitatsarvo 'smīti manyate prajāpatervīryeṇa tadyatpratyañcaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:889: yantamavaghrāpayati pratyaṅ hyevaiṣa yannimāḥ sarvāḥ prajā abhijighrati 7.3.2.[13]
GV03sb_07_u:891: asau vā āditya eṣo 'śva ima u lokā etāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:896: prajāpatimabruvaṃstvamimamanvica sa tubhyaṃ svāya pitra āvirbhaviṣyatīti
GV03sb_07_u:897: tamaśvaḥ śuklo bhūtvānvaicattamadbhya upodāsṛptam puṣkaraparṇe viveda
GV03sb_07_u:898: tamabhyavekṣāṃ cakre sa hainamuduvoṣa tasmāduvoṣa tasmādaśvaḥ śukla
GV03sb_07_u:899: uduṣṭamukha ivāthā ha durakṣo bhāvukastamu vā ṛtveva hiṃsitveva mete taṃ
GV03sb_07_u:901: sa hovāca / yastvānena rūpeṇānvicādvindādeva tvā sa iti sa yo hainametena
GV03sb_07_u:902: rūpeṇānvicati vindati hainaṃ vittvā haivainaṃ cinute 7.3.2.[16]
GV03sb_07_u:904: taddhyetasya rūpaṃ ya eṣa tapati yadi śuklaṃ na vindedapyaśuklaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:905: syādaśvastveva syādyadyaśvaṃ na vindedapyanaḍvāneva syādāgneyo vā
GV03sb_07_u:909: na tathā kuryātpaśureṣa yadagniryo vai paśum purastātpratyañcamadhirohati
GV03sb_07_u:910: viṣāṇābhyāṃ taṃ hantyatha yaḥ paścātprāñcam padbhyāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:911: tamātmanevainamārohedyaṃ vā ātmanā paśumārohanti sa pārayati sa na
GV03sb_07_u:912: hinastyuttarato yaṃ hi kaṃ ca paśumārohantyuttarata
GV03sb_07_u:914: ātmannagniṃ gṛhītvā satyaṃ sāma gāyati puṣkaraparṇamupadadhāti tasyātaḥ 7.3.2.[18]
GV03sb_07_u:917: rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti tasmā etaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:921: eṣa vā asya pratyakṣaṃ divā goptā bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:922: rātrisācayānyu vai rakṣāṃsi rātryā evāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karoti sarvataḥ
GV03sb_07_u:923: pariṇayati sarvata evāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karoti triṣkṛtvaḥ pariṇayati
GV03sb_07_u:924: trivṛtamevāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karotyathainamudañcam prāñcam prasṛjati
GV03sb_07_u:925: tasyokto bandhuratha sa punarvipalyayate tasyopari bandhuḥ 7.4.1.[1]
GV03sb_07_u:927: ātmano vā etamadhijanayati yādṛśādva jāyate tādṛṅṅeva
GV03sb_07_u:932: sa gṛhṇāti / mayi gṛhṇāmyagre agnimiti tadātmannevāgre 'gniṃ gṛhṇāti rāyaspoṣāya
GV03sb_07_u:933: suprajāstvāya suvīryāyeti tadu sarvā āśiṣa ātmangṛhṇīte māmu devatāḥ sacantāmiti
GV03sb_07_u:935: tatsarvamātmangṛhṇīte sa vai tiṣṭhannātmannagniṃ gṛhītvānūpaviśya cinoti
GV03sb_07_u:938: etadvai devā abruvantsatyamasya mukhaṃ karavāma te
GV03sb_07_u:939: satyam bhaviṣyāmaḥ satyaṃ no 'nuvartsyati satyo naḥ sa kāmo bhaviṣyati yatkāmā
GV03sb_07_u:946: yatsatyaṃ sāma purastādgāyati tadasya satyam mukhaṃ karoti
GV03sb_07_u:947: sa satyam bhavati satyamenamanuvartate satyo 'sya sa kāmo bhavati yatkāma
GV03sb_07_u:950: āpa eva tadāpo hi vai satyaṃ tasmādyenāpo yanti tatsatyasya
GV03sb_07_u:956: āpo vai puṣkaraṃ tāsāmiyam parṇaṃ yathā ha
GV03sb_07_u:959: tāmanantarhitāṃ satyādupadadhātīmāṃ tatsatye pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādiyaṃ satye
GV03sb_07_u:963: samudramabhitaḥ pinvamānamiti samudro homāmabhitaḥ pinvate vardhamāno
GV03sb_07_u:964: mahāṃ ā ca puṣkara iti vardhamāno mahīyasva puṣkara ityetaddivo mātrayā
GV03sb_07_u:965: varimṇā prathasvetyanuvimārṣṭyasau vā āditya eṣo 'gnirno haitamanyo divo varimā
GV03sb_07_u:966: yantumarhati dyaurbhūtvainaṃ yacetyevaitadāha svarājopaddhāti svārājyaṃ hyapāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:969: asau vā āditya eṣa rukbha eṣa hīmāḥ sarvāḥ prajā
GV03sb_07_u:970: atirocate roco ha vai taṃ rukbha ityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi devā
GV03sb_07_u:973: etasya nirbādhā avastādu vā etasya raśmayaḥ 7.4.1.[11]
GV03sb_07_u:979: puṣkaraparṇamiyamu vai pratiṣṭhā yo vā asyāmapratiṣṭhito 'pi dūre
GV03sb_07_u:980: sannapratiṣṭhita eva sa raśmibhirvā eṣo 'syām pratiṣṭhito
GV03sb_07_u:984: prāviśattā abravīdbibhemi vai puram me kuruteti sa yo 'pāṃ rasa āsīttamūrdhvaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:986: pūṣkaraṃ ha vai tatpuṣkaramityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi
GV03sb_07_u:991: purastājjāyate vi sīmataḥ suruco vena āvariti madhyaṃ vai sīmeme lokāḥ suruco
GV03sb_07_u:993: vivṛṣvannudeti sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhā iti diśo vā asya budhnyā upamā
GV03sb_07_u:994: viṣṭhāstā hyeṣa upavitiṣṭhate sataśca yonimasataśca vivaritīme vai lokāḥ sataśca
GV03sb_07_u:995: yonirasataśca yacca hyasti yacca na tadebhya eva lokebhyo jāyate triṣṭubhopadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:996: traiṣṭabho hyeṣa sādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ 7.4.1.[15]
GV03sb_07_u:998: sa prajāpatiḥ so 'gniḥ sa yajamānaḥ sa hiraṇmayo bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:999: jyotirvai hiraṇyaṃ jyotiragniramṛtaṃ hiraṇyamamṛtamagniḥ puruṣo bhavati puruṣo
GV03sb_07_u:1005: aramanta tadyadasyaitasyāṃ ramyāyāṃ tanvāṃ devā aramanta tasmāddhiramyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1006: hiramyaṃ ha vai taddhiraṇyamityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi
GV03sb_07_u:1007: devāstathaivāsminnayametāṃ ramyāṃ tanūm madhyato dadhāti tasyāmasya devā
GV03sb_07_u:1008: ramante prāṇo vā asya sā ramyā tanūḥ prāṇamevāsminnetam madhyato dadhāti 7.4.1.[17]
GV03sb_07_u:1010: asau vā āditya eṣa rukbho 'tha ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale
GV03sb_07_u:1013: etadvai devā abruvanyadi vā imāvarvāñcā upadhāsyāmaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1014: sarvamevedam pradhakṣyato yadyu parāñcau parāñcāveva tapsyato yadyu
GV03sb_07_u:1016: 'rvāñcamanyamupādadhuḥ parāñcamanyaṃ sa eṣa raśmibhirarvāṅ tapati rukbhaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1017: prāṇaireṣa ūrdhvaḥ puruṣaḥ prāñcamupadadhāti prāṅ hyeṣo 'gniścīyate 7.4.1.[19]
GV03sb_07_u:1020: jātaḥ patireka āsīdityeṣa hyasya sarvasya bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsītsa dādhāra
GV03sb_07_u:1021: pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemāmityeṣa vai divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca dādhāra kasmai devāya haviṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1022: vidhemeti prajā patirvai kastasmai haviṣā vidhemetyetat 7.4.1.[20]
GV03sb_07_u:1024: asau vā ādityo drapsaḥ sa divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1025: ca skandatītyamūmitīmāmimaṃ ca yonimanu yaśca pūrva itīmaṃ ca lokamamuṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1026: cetyetadatho yaccedametarhi cīyate yaccādaḥ pūrvamacīyateti samānaṃ yonimanu
GV03sb_07_u:1027: saṃcarantamiti samānaṃ hyepa etaṃ yonimanu saṃcarati drapsaṃ juhomyanu sapta
GV03sb_07_u:1028: hotrā ityasau vā ādityo drapso diśaḥ sapta hotrā amuṃ tadādityaṃ dikṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1037: te 'bruvan / upa tajjānīta yathāsminpuruṣe vīryaṃ dadhāmeti te
GV03sb_07_u:1042: puruṣe gāyati puruṣe tadvīryaṃ dadhāti citre gāyati sarvāṇi hi
GV03sb_07_u:1045: ime vai lokāḥ sarpāste hānena sarveṇa sarpanti
GV03sb_07_u:1046: yadidaṃ kiṃ ca sarveṣāmu haiṣa devānāmātmā yadagniste devā
GV03sb_07_u:1047: etamātmānamupadhāyābibhayuryadvai na ime lokā anenātmanā na surpeyuriti 7.4.1.[26]
GV03sb_07_u:1052: etallokāntsthāpayatīmāṃlokānnamayati tatho hāsyaita etenātmanā na sarpanti 7.4.1.[27]
GV03sb_07_u:1054: ime vai lokāḥ sarpā yaddhi kiṃ ca sarpatyeṣveva
GV03sb_07_u:1055: tallokeṣu sarpati tadyatsarpanāmairupatiṣṭhate yaivaiṣu lokeṣu nāṣṭrā yo
GV03sb_07_u:1057: namo 'stu sarpebhyo ye ke ca pṛthivīmanu /
GV03sb_07_u:1058: ye antarikṣe ye divi tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo
GV03sb_07_u:1059: nama iti ya evaiṣu triṣu lokeṣu sarpāstebhya etannamaskaroti 7.4.1.[29]
GV03sb_07_u:1061: yātudhānapreṣitā haike daśanti ye vā vanaspatīmranu ye
GV03sb_07_u:1062: vāvaṭeṣu śerate tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo nama iti ye caiva vanaspatiṣu sarpā ye cāvaṭeṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1065: ye vā sūryasya raśmiṣu yeṣāmapsu sadaskṛtaṃ tebhyaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1066: sarpebhyo nama iti yatra yatraite tadevaibhya etannamaskaroti namo nama iti yajño
GV03sb_07_u:1067: vai namo yajñenaivainānetannamaskāreṇa namasyati tasmādu ha nāyajñiya
GV03sb_07_u:1068: brūyānnamasta iti yathā hainam brūyādyajñasta iti tādṛktat 7.4.1.[31]
GV03sb_07_u:1070: traya ime lokā atho trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_07_u:1072: tiṣṭhannupatiṣṭhate tiṣṭhantīva vā ime lokā atho tiṣṭhanvai vīryavattaraḥ 7.4.1.[32]
GV03sb_07_u:1078: imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etānrākṣoghnānpratisarānapaśyankṛṇuṣva
GV03sb_07_u:1079: pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīmiti rākṣoghnā vai pratisarāsta etaiḥ pratisaraiḥ sarvābhyo
GV03sb_07_u:1080: digbhyo rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etamātmānaṃ samaskurvata
GV03sb_07_u:1081: tathaivaitadyajamāna etaiḥ pratisaraiḥ sarvābhyo digbhyo rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:1084: vajro vā ājyaṃ vajreṇaivaitaprakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti pañcagṛhītena
GV03sb_07_u:1088: triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti sarvataḥ parisarpaṃ sarvābhya
GV03sb_07_u:1095: bāhū vai srucau bāhū evāsminnetatpratidadhāti te yatsrucau
GV03sb_07_u:1096: bhavataḥ srucau hi bāhū idameva kapucalamayaṃ daṇdo dve bhavato dvau hīmau
GV03sb_07_u:1097: bāhū pāśvata upadadhāti pārśvato hīmau bāhū 7.4.1.[37]
GV03sb_07_u:1100: dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etaṃ rakṣohaṇaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1101: vanaspatimapaśyankārṣmaryaṃ ta etena vanaspatinā dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:1102: apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etaṃ yajñamatanvata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena vanaspatinā
GV03sb_07_u:1103: dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etaṃ yajñaṃ tanuta ājyena pūrṇā
GV03sb_07_u:1104: bhavati vajro vā ājyaṃ vajreṇaivaitaddakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti 7.4.1.[38]
GV03sb_07_u:1107: dadhāti dadhnā pūrṇā bhavati raso vai dadhi rasamevāsminnetaddadhāti 7.4.1.[39]
GV03sb_07_u:1113: upa metam prati ma etaddhattaṃ yena me yuvamudakramiṣṭamiti
GV03sb_07_u:1114: tābhyāṃ vai nau sarvamannam prayaceti tau vai mā bāhū bhūtvā prapadyethāmiti
GV03sb_07_u:1115: tatheti tābhyāṃ vai sarvamannam prāyacattāvenam bāhū bhūtvā prāpadyetāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1116: tasmādbāhubhyāmevānnaṃ kriyate bāhubhyāmadyate bāhubhyāṃ hi sa sarvamannam
GV03sb_07_u:1122: tāvataivaināmetadupadadhāti ghṛtena pūrṇā bhavatyāgneyaṃ vai ghṛtaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1127: netetyeṣa u sa indraḥ sā yadāgneyyagnikarma hyatha yattriṣṭuptraiṣṭubho hīndra
GV03sb_07_u:1130: tāvataivaināmetadupadadhāti dadhnā pūrṇā bhavatyaindraṃ vai dadhi
GV03sb_07_u:1133: tāvenaṃ tejasā ca vīryeṇa ca saha prapadyete sa
GV03sb_07_u:1137: tiryañcau vā imau bāhū iti na tathā
GV03sb_07_u:1138: kuryātprācyāvevopadadhyātprāṅ hyeṣo 'gniścīyate 'tho evaṃ vai bāhū vīryavattarau te
GV03sb_07_u:1139: nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hīmau bāhū 7.4.1.[45]
GV03sb_07_u:1140: tadāhuḥ / naitasya puruṣasya bāhū kuryādetau vā asya bāhū ye ete srucau
GV03sb_07_u:1141: nedatirecayānīti sa vai kuryādevaitau vā asya bāhū anvete srucāvatho etau
GV03sb_07_u:1143: yāni candāṃsyetayoreva sā saṃskṛtiretayorvṛddhistasmādu kuryādevaitasya puruṣasya
GV03sb_07_u:1148: svayamātṛṇeyamu vā annamasyāṃ hi sarvamannam pacyate
GV03sb_07_u:1153: puruṣādupadadhāti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇeyaṃ vai svayamātṛṇeyamu vai prāṇo yaddhi
GV03sb_07_u:1165: dhruvāsīti sthirāsītyetadatho pratiṣṭhitāsīti dharuṇeti pratiṣṭhā vai dharuṇamāstṛtā
GV03sb_07_u:1166: viśvakarmaṇeti prajāpatirvai viśvakarmā tenāstṛtāsītyetanmā tvā samudra
GV03sb_07_u:1167: udvadhīnmā suparṇa iti rukbho vai samudraḥ puruṣaḥ suparṇastau tvā
GV03sb_07_u:1168: modvadhiṣṭāmityetadavyathamānā pṛthivīṃ dṛṃheti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ 7.4.2.[6]
GV03sb_07_u:1171: samudrasyemannityapāṃ hīyam pṛṣṭhaṃ samudrasya hīyamema vyacasvatīm
GV03sb_07_u:1172: prathasvatīmiti vyacasvatī ca hīyam prathasvatī ca prathasva pṛthivyasīti prathasva
GV03sb_07_u:1174: bhūrasīti / bhūrhīyam bhūmirasīti bhūmirhīyamaditirasītīyaṃ vā aditiriyaṃ hīdaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1175: sarvaṃ dadate viśvadhāyā ityasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ hitaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya dhartrīti
GV03sb_07_u:1176: sarvasya bhuvanasya dhartrītyetatpṛthivīṃ yaca pṛthivīṃ dṛṃha pṛthivīm mā
GV03sb_07_u:1179: vyānāyodānāyeti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇā sarvasmā u vā
GV03sb_07_u:1180: etasmai prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāyai caritrāyetīme vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā ima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1182: mahatyā svastyetyetaccardiṣā śaṃtameneti yaccardiḥ śaṃtamaṃ tenetyetatsādayitvā
GV03sb_07_u:1183: sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuratha sāma gāyati tasyopari bandhuḥ 7.4.2.[9]
GV03sb_07_u:1184: tadāhuḥ / kathamepa puruṣaḥ svayamātṛṇayānabhinihito bhavatītyannaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:1185: svayamātṛṇā prāṇaḥ svayamātṛṇānabhinihito v ai puruṣo 'nnena ca prāṇena ca 7.4.2.[10]
GV03sb_07_u:1194: so 'bravīt / ayaṃ vāva mādhūrvīditi yadabravīdadhūrvīnmeti tasmāddhūrvā dhūrvā ha
GV03sb_07_u:1195: vai tāṃ dūrvetyācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi devāstadetatkṣatram prāṇo
GV03sb_07_u:1196: hyeṣa raso lomānyanyā oṣadhaya etāmupadadhatsarvā oṣadhīrupadadhāti 7.4.2.[13]
GV03sb_07_u:1201: oṣadhīrdadhātyuttarāmuttarāstadasyā oṣadhīrdadhāti sā syātsamūlā sāgrā kṛtsnatāyai
GV03sb_07_u:1206: parvaṇaḥ-parvaṇaḥ prarohatyevā no pūrve pratanu sahasreṇa śatena ceti yathaiva
GV03sb_07_u:1209: sahasreṇa virohasīti śatena hyeṣā pratanoti sahasreṇa virohati
GV03sb_07_u:1210: tasyāste devīṣṭake vidhema haviṣā vayamiti yathaiva yajustathā
GV03sb_07_u:1217: yena rūpeṇa yatkarma kṛtvendrāgnī svargaṃ lokamaitāṃ tena rūpeṇa tatkarma kṛtvā
GV03sb_07_u:1218: svargaṃ lokamayānīti sā yaddviyajurnāma dve hyetāṃ devate apaśyatāṃ yadveva
GV03sb_07_u:1220: tadāhuḥ / yadasāveva yajamāno yo 'sau hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo 'tha katamadasyedaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1221: rūpamiti daivo vā asya sa ātmā manuṣo 'yaṃ tadyatsa hiraṇmayo bhavatyamṛtaṃ vā
GV03sb_07_u:1222: asya tadrūpaṃ devarūpamamṛtaṃ hiraṇyamatha yadiyam mṛdaḥ kṛtā bhavati mānuṣaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1226: preyādatha yadimāmapaśinaṣṭi yadevāsyedam mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tadasyaitadapaśinaṣṭi
GV03sb_07_u:1230: tatho haitaṃ daivamātmānamanuprajānāti tāmanantarhitāṃ dūrveṣṭakāyā upadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1231: paśavo vai dūrveṣṭakā yajamānaṃ tatpaśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati 7.4.2.[20]
GV03sb_07_u:1232: tadāhuḥ / kathamasyaitāvātmānau prāṇena saṃtatāvavyavacinnau bhavata iti prāṇo vai
GV03sb_07_u:1233: svayamātṛṇā prāṇo dūrveṣṭakā yajamāno dviyajuḥ sa yadanantarhitāṃ svayamātṛṇāyai
GV03sb_07_u:1235: yadanantarhitāṃ dūrveṣṭakāyai dviyajuṣamupadadhāti prāṇo vai dūrveṣṭakā
GV03sb_07_u:1236: yajamāno dviyajurevamu hāsyaitāvātmānau prāṇena saṃtatāvavyavacinnau bhavataḥ 7.4.2.[21]
GV03sb_07_u:1238: yā vo devāḥ sūrye ruca iti rucaṃ rucamityamṛtatvaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:1240: dvayaṃ hyevaitadrūpam mṛccāpaśca sādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ 7.4.2.[22]
GV03sb_07_u:1242: imau vai lokau retaḥsicāvimau hyeva lokau retaḥ siñcata
GV03sb_07_u:1243: ito vā ayamūrdhvaṃ retaḥ siñcati dhūmaṃ sāmutra vṛṣṭirbhavati tāmasāvamuto
GV03sb_07_u:1244: vṛṣṭiṃ tadimā antareṇa prajāyante tasmādimau lokau retaḥsicau 7.4.2.[23]
GV03sb_07_u:1246: ayaṃ vai loko virāṭ sa imamagniṃ jyotirdhārayati
GV03sb_07_u:1247: svarāḍjyotiradhārayadityasau vai lokaḥ svarāṭ so mumādityaṃ jyotirdhārayati
GV03sb_07_u:1248: virāḍvahemau lokau svarāṭca nānopadadhāti nānā hīmau lokau sakṛtsādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1251: āṇḍau vai retaḥsicau yasya hyāṇḍau bhavataḥ sa eva
GV03sb_07_u:1253: svarāṭca tāvetajjyotirdhārayato reta eva prajāpatimeva nānopadadhāti nānā
GV03sb_07_u:1254: homāvāṇḍau sakṛtsādayati samānaṃ tatkaroti tasmātsamānasambandhanau te
GV03sb_07_u:1255: anantarhite dviyajuṣa upadadhāti yajamāno vai dviyajuranantarhitau
GV03sb_07_u:1263: prajā vai viśvajyotiḥ prajā hyeva viśvaṃ jyotiḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1271: vyānāyeti prāṇo vai viśvajyotiḥ sarvasmā u etasmai prāṇo
GV03sb_07_u:1276: mādhavaśca vāsantikāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1277: dve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ karoti 7.4.2.[30]
GV03sb_07_u:1280: lokaḥ prathamā citirayamasya loko vasanta ṛtustadyadete atropadadhāti yadevāsyaite
GV03sb_07_u:1284: pratiṣṭhaiva prathamā citiḥ pratiṣṭho asya vasanta ṛtustadyadete atropadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1286: anantarhite viśvajyotiṣa upadadhāti prajā vai viśvajyotiranantarhitāstatprajā ṛtubhyo
GV03sb_07_u:1287: dadhāti tasmātprajā ṛtūnevānuprajāyanta ṛtubhirhyeva garbhe santaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1304: prāṇā vai vāmaṃ yaddhi kiṃ ca prāṇīyaṃ tatsarvam bibharti teneyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1305: vāmabhṛdvāggha tveva vābhṛtprāṇā vai vāmaṃ vāci vai prāṇebhyo 'nnaṃ dhīyate
GV03sb_07_u:1316: saṃvatsaro vā ṛtavye saṃvatsareṇa tatprajābhyo vācamantardadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1319: asahanta hyetayā devā asurāntsahasvārātīḥ sahasva pṛtanāyata
GV03sb_07_u:1320: iti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ sahasravīryāsi sā mā jinveti sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1321: sarvavīryāsi sā mā jinvetyetatsādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ 7.4.2.[40]
GV03sb_07_u:1322: tadāhuḥ / kasmādabhisvayamātṛṇamanyā iṣṭakā upadhīyante prācya etā iti dve vai
GV03sb_07_u:1323: yonī iti brūyāddevayoniranyo manuṣyayoniranyaḥ prācīnaprajananā vai devāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1327: raso vai kūrmo rasamevaitadupadadhāti yo vai sa eṣāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1329: yāvānu vai rasastāvānātmā sa eṣa ima eva lokāḥ 7.5.1.[2]
GV03sb_07_u:1331: ayaṃ sa lokastatpratiṣṭhitamiva bhavati pratiṣṭhita iva
GV03sb_07_u:1332: hyayaṃ loko 'tha yaduttaraṃ sā dyaustadbyavagṛhītāntamiva bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:1333: vyavagṛhītānteva hi dyauratha yadantarā tadantarikṣaṃ sa eṣa ima eva lokā
GV03sb_07_u:1336: dadhnā madhunā ghṛtena dadhi haivāsya lokasya rūpaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1338: dadhi haivāsya lokasya raso ghṛtamantarikṣasya madhvamuṣya
GV03sb_07_u:1341: yāṃ vai devatāmṛgabhyanūktā yāṃ yajuḥ saiva devatā sa 'kṣo
GV03sb_07_u:1342: devatā tadyajustaddhaitanmadhvevaiṣa trico raso vai madhu
GV03sb_07_u:1345: etadvai rūpaṃ kṛtvā prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata
GV03sb_07_u:1351: tasmādasāvādityaḥ purastātpratyaṅ dhīyate dakṣiṇato 'ṣāḍhāyai vṛṣā vai kūrmo
GV03sb_07_u:1352: yoṣāṣāḍhā dakṣiṇato vai vṛṣā yoṣāmupaśete 'ratnimātre 'ratnimātrāddhi vṛṣā
GV03sb_07_u:1353: yoṣāmupaśete saiṣā sarvāsāmiṣṭakānām mahiṣī yadaṣāḍhaitasyai dakṣiṇataḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1356: prāṇo vai kūrmaḥ prāṇo hīmāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ karoti
GV03sb_07_u:1358: prāṇaṃ dadhāti tasmātpurastātpratyaṅ prāṇo dhīyate puruṣamabhyāvṛttaṃ yajamāne
GV03sb_07_u:1359: tatprāṇaṃ dadhāti dakṣiṇato 'ṣāḍhāyai prāṇo vai kūrmo vāgaṣāḍhā prāṇo vai vāco
GV03sb_07_u:1362: etaddhāpāṃ gambhiṣṭhaṃ yatraiṣa etattapati mā tvā sūryo
GV03sb_07_u:1363: 'bhitāpsīnmāgnirvaiśvānara iti maiva tvā sūryo hiṃsīnmo agnirvaiśvānara
GV03sb_07_u:1364: ityetadacinnapatrāḥ prajā anuvīkṣasvetīmā vai sarvāḥ prajā yā imā iṣṭakāstā ariṣṭā
GV03sb_07_u:1365: anārtā anuvīkṣasvetyetadanu tvā divyā vṛṣṭiḥ sacatāmiti yathaivainaṃ divyā
GV03sb_07_u:1369: lokāstāneṣa kūrmo bhūtvānusaṃsasarpāpām patirvṛṣabha iṣṭakānāmityapāṃ hyeṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1370: patirvṛṣabha iṣṭakānām purīṣaṃ vasānaḥ sukṛtasya loka iti paśavo vai purīṣam
GV03sb_07_u:1371: paśūnvasānaḥ sukṛtasya loka ityetattatra gaca yatra pūrve paretā iti tatra gaca
GV03sb_07_u:1373: mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na iti /
GV03sb_07_u:1374: mahatī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na ityetadimaṃ yajñam
GV03sb_07_u:1375: mimikṣatāmitīmaṃ yajñamavatāmityetatpipṛtāṃ no bharīmabhiriti bibhṛtāṃ no
GV03sb_07_u:1378: traya ime lokā atho trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_07_u:1380: adhastādbhavantyavakā upariṣṭādāpo vā avakā apāmevainametanmadhyato dadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1385: yadulūkhalamusale upadadhāti yena rūpeṇa yatkarma kṛtvā viṣṇurannādo 'bhavattena
GV03sb_07_u:1389: pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata
GV03sb_07_u:1395: ātmasammitamannaṃ tadavati tanna hinasti yadbhūyo hinasti tadyatkanīyo na
GV03sb_07_u:1399: sarva ete vanaspatayo yadudumbara ete upadadhatsarvānvanaspatīnupadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1401: tasmādanayorvanaspatayaścatuḥsrakti bhavati catasro vai diśaḥ sarvāsu taddikṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1402: vanaspatīndadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu vanaspatayo madhye saṃgṛhītam
GV03sb_07_u:1412: ggṛhītā yo hyevānnamatti sa prāṇiti tamūrjayati 7.5.1.[19]
GV03sb_07_u:1414: asmādete ubhe udacikramiṣatāṃ te ūrjāgṛhṇāttasmādete ubhe ūrjā
GV03sb_07_u:1418: tadetadannam prapadyamānaṃ sarve devā anuprāpadyantānnajīvanaṃ hīdaṃ sarvam 7.5.1.[21]
GV03sb_07_u:1420: tadvai sa prāṇo 'bhavaditi taddhi sa prāṇo 'bhavanmahā
GV03sb_07_u:1421: bhūtvā prajāpatiriti mahānhi sa tadabhavadyadenamete devāḥ prāpadyanta bhujo
GV03sb_07_u:1422: bhujiṣyā vittveti prāṇā vai bhujo 'nnam bhujiṣyā etatsarvaṃ vittvetye
GV03sb_07_u:1423: tadyatprāṇānprāṇayatpurītyātmā vai pūryadvai prāṇānprāṇayattasmātprāṇā devā atha
GV03sb_07_u:1424: yatprajāpatiḥ prāṇayattasmādu prajāpatiḥ prāṇo yo vai sa prāṇa eṣā sā gāyatryatha
GV03sb_07_u:1425: yattadannameṣa sa viṣṇurdevatātha yā so 'rgeṣa sa udumbaraḥ 7.5.1.[22]
GV03sb_07_u:1426: so 'bravīt / ayaṃ vāva mā sarvasmātpāpmana udabhārṣīditi
GV03sb_07_u:1427: yadabravīdudabhārṣīnmeti tasmādupumbhara udumbharo ha vai tamudumbara
GV03sb_07_u:1428: ityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi devā uru me karaditi
GV03sb_07_u:1429: tasmādurukaramurukaraṃ ha vai tadulūkhalamityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro
GV03sb_07_u:1430: 'kṣakāmā hi devāḥ saiṣā sarveṣām prāṇānāṃ yoniryadulūkhalaṃ śiro vai prāṇānāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1434: catuḥsraktīva hi śiro madhye saṃgṛhītam bhavati madhye saṃgṛhītamiva hi śiraḥ 7.5.1.[24]
GV03sb_07_u:1438: retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata evāsminnetatsarvaṃ dadhāti 7.5.1.[25]
GV03sb_07_u:1440: vīryaṃ vai karma viṣṇorvīryāṇi paśyatetyetadyato vratāni
GV03sb_07_u:1441: paspaśa ityannaṃ vai vrataṃ yato 'nnaṃ spāśayāṃ cakra ityetadindrasya yujyaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1442: sakhetīndrasya hyeṣa yujyaḥ sakhā dvidevatyayopadadhāti dvehyulūkhalamumale
GV03sb_07_u:1443: sakṛtsādayati samānaṃ tatkaroti samānaṃ hyetadannameva sādayitvā
GV03sb_07_u:1446: upadadhātyantarikṣaṃ vā ulūkhalaṃ yadvai kiṃ cāsyā ūrdhvamantarikṣameva
GV03sb_07_u:1447: tanmadhyaṃ vā antarikṣam madhyatastadyoniṃ dadhāti tasmātsarveṣām bhūtānām
GV03sb_07_u:1450: yo vai sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsasataiṣā sokheme vai lokā
GV03sb_07_u:1457: tadāhuḥ / kathamasyaiṣā pakvā śṛtopahitā bhavatītiṃ yadeva yajuṣkṛtā tenātho
GV03sb_07_u:1458: yadvai kiṃ caitamagniṃ vaiśvānaramupanigacati tata eva tatpakvaṃ śṛtamupahitam
GV03sb_07_u:1461: tasyokto bandhurito jajñe prathamamebhyo yonibhyo adhi
GV03sb_07_u:1462: jātavedā ityetebhyo hi yonibhyaḥ prathamaṃ jātavedā ajāyata sa gāyatryā
GV03sb_07_u:1463: triṣṭubhānuṣṭubhā ca devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānannityetairvā eṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1467: ramasvetyetatsamrāḍasi svarāḍasīti samrāṭca hyeṣa svarāṭca sārasvatau tvotsau
GV03sb_07_u:1468: prāpavatāmiti mano vai sarasvānvākṣarasvatyetau sārasvatā utsau tau tvā
GV03sb_07_u:1470: mṛccā paśca sādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ 7.5.1.[32]
GV03sb_07_u:1473: sikatāstadetadabhikaroti tasmādyonau retaḥ siktamabhikriyata ājyena juhoti sruveṇa
GV03sb_07_u:1477: yuktavatībhyāmidamevaitadyonau reto yunakti tasmādyonau reto yuktaṃ na
GV03sb_07_u:1481: sarvaṃ tadyadabhijuhītyatha yadyasaṃvatsarabhṛtaḥ syādupaiva tiṣṭhetāsarvaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:1484: so 'traiva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃskṛtastasyāvāṅ prāṇaḥ svayamātṛṇā
